text: Vertebral segmentation defect 90% Cleft palate 7.5% Conductive hearing impairment 7.5% Pectus excavatum 7.5% Polycystic kidney dysplasia 7.5% Sensorineural hearing impairment 7.5% Abnormality of pelvic girdle bone morphology - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Block vertebrae - Broad face - Broad nasal tip - C2-C3 subluxation - Carpal synostosis - Cataract - Clinodactyly of the 5th finger - Delayed skeletal maturation - Disproportionate short-trunk short stature - Epiphyseal dysplasia - Hypertel
